channel.title: Prometheus 317RSPS: Custom whips, hard skilling and economy
channel.description:
-Prometheus RSPS-
Prometheus is a Ballscape based RSPS, it has custom whips, fully working Barrows items, Dragon dagger poison and more!
MINIGAMES:
-Pest control -Duel arena -Tzhaar Caves with 10 waves! -Barrows
BOSSES:
-Godwars dungeon -King Black Dragon -Dagannoth Kings -Chaos Elemental -Kalphite Queen -Ice cave with ice guards and queen (Drops iron-dragon whips)
100% Skilling system!
Awesome economy!
100% Pking system!
100% Highscore system
Awesome staff!
WEBSITE:
http://prometheus.webege.com/
PLAY NOW:
http://prometheus.webege.com/webclient/webclient.html
Download client from the website!
Pictures are also on the website!
Enjoy your stay at Prometheus!
-[Qeruina & Lardain]-
